ValidationRule.description: #Req 064 Sprint 3 To Validate File Versioning on Offer Object.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( OR( Add_In_Version__c < VALUE($Label.Excel_Add_In_Version), Add_In_Version__c = null)), !(ISCHANGED( Price__c )), $Profile.Name=$Label.Excel_Add_In_Profile_Name )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please upload LoA File using New Add in Version . The version you tried to load is outdated. The Excel Add-in Version should be v2.7.0.0
